title: Mi 4A Horizon Edition 108 cm (43 inch) Full HD LED Smart Android TV

product_specification.In The Box: LED TV 1U, Remote Control 1U, Manual & Warranty Card 1U, Stand 1U, Screws 4U
product_specification.Sound Mode: Standard, News, Movie, Game, Custom, 5 Band Equalizer
product_specification.Content Providers: Netflix, Prime Video, Disney+ Hotstar, Help, Sensy TV Guide, YouTube, Play Movies, Play Music, Play Store
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty and 2 Years for Panel
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear and Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: 1. Covered Under Standard Installation - Table Mounting Using Standard Stand Supplied as Accessory with TV - Extra Charges are Applicable for Wall Mounts as, Rs. 399 for 32 inch Display Size and Rs. 499 for >32 inch Display Size - Connecting with Available Power Source (within 1 Meter) - Connecting / Setting Up Various Available Input Source for Audio Video Based on Model - Connecting with Available WiFi (for Smart TV) - Checking TV for Proper Functioning - Demonstration of the TV and its Features

product_description.Immersive Viewing: Enjoy an immersive experience while watching movies, shows, and your web series on the expansive Mi 4A 108 cm (43) Horizon Edition Android TV, which is perfectly tuned.
product_description.Expansive Horizon View: Owing to its expansive Horizon design, this TV highlights every detail of the image for a virtually limitless viewing experience.

review:
I have recently purchased this Mi TV 4A 32 inch Horizon Edition from flipkart. After using it for a while now I can say that this is the best value for money android TV with lot of useful features which makes it perfect to use.

Pros:-
Bluetooth and wifi built in
Chromecast built in
Very good video quality
Rich sound output
Google assistant key in remote

I would like to thank Ekart executive for delivering it on time and also thanks to Xiaomi for super quick installation.

Pros-
-Good Value for money product.
-Adequate connectivity options, 3 hdmi (hdmi 1 is ARC), 2 USB, 1 3.5 MM audio jack. WIFI, Bluetooth
-Thin bezels
- Build quality is decent and it's light weight
- Patch wall UI is nicer then stock android
- Decent Picture quality and Sound
- Apperently Xiaomi has better service network then real me or one plus.


Cons-
- No audio digital output port.
- No support for 5 Ghz wifi
- Minimalistic remote, no button for mute. One need to fiddle with vol - to ...
READ MORE
Picture quality is so good sound quality is good best smart tv at this price

Everything works fine ( One day used ) 40 inch Horizon

Attractions -
1. Automatically connecting with the last used HDMI slot when we Turn on the TV.
Helping aged people to connect with cable tv easily.No need to select hdmi slot in settings each and every time.
2. Turning On the tv back is easier.( Turn Off and On using remote , Don't switch off the power plug _helps to avoid the booting time)
3.Bluetooth connectivity ( connected to home theater )

Negative -
1.HeadPhone jack is not good/(no use),The voice output is very low When I connected my Home theater to TV using aux cable.
2.picture quality is fine... getting wow reviews over display quality will be only based on the price segment comparison.
3. Weightless_feels like it will fall down easily.

Display quality is fine, Go for 4K* screens and better brands if you are expecting something more from display

Pros :
* Picture and video quality is decent.
* Minimum bezels.
* Viewing angle is very good
* Access to most of the apps works like a charm.
* Easy to login and sync to the applications.
* Convinient way of finding apps, thanks to Android app drawer and Patchwall.

Cons :
* Internet connectivity drops frequently.
* Few apps return error on launch again due to connectivity.
* Voice assistant takes few tries before it actually triggers the input.

Amazing product
Hardly recommended
Thanku Mi nd Flipkart for this wonderful product with best prices.

I recently purchased this Mi TV Horizon Edition from flipkart. I am actually impressed by the build quality of this TV. The display of this TV is truely bezel less. The picture quality is really very very good and sound output is also very loud and clear. It supports all major content providers and you can play all content directly from TV. Its also supports bluetooth, so you can connect your bluetooth earphones and watch your favourite movie at night without disturbing others. Thanks to flipkart for super quick delivery and installation of my Mi TV.
The best LED smart TV at this price range with so many add on features and awesome viewing experience, decent sound quality.😊

Last week I purchased this newly launched Mi TV 40 inch Horizon Edition from flipkart, after watching lots of video reviews on youtube. I'm LG TV user from last 10 years which is still going great but that was worth 70k! This time had such a cheap option so decided to give a try. Honestly built quality is not that strong or sturdy as big brands but it's optimised for better value for money! I got VA panel unit unfortunately but can't expect IPS for this price. Sound quality is great if you know how to tune EQ. There is no bass from speakers and one should not expect also. Now coming to the brightness I have no complaints so far if you keep daylight dimming off. Saturation and all others settings are good on standard settings. The worst part is Installation and Demo. The Jeeves technician knew the guideline so as per guideline he just called me 3 times and kept himself on mute then called alternate number once and kept himself on mute again. So his guideline was followed and he straight away went home! When I called him back he explained me this guideline and went in argument I felt like he was drunk. I had to open the TV and install it myself. But installation & demo was horrible experience till the date I have got for any product! I'll recommend to install stands yourself as that's matter of minutes. If you want wall mounted setup then installer is recommended.
Update - After 3 days same installer called me and this time he came. As TV was already installed by me he was super happy. He just took OTP and flew away! He also aaksed me to get extended warranty for 2k which I denied. I'll prefer buying stabilizer of 2k! Disappointment came back in picture as he didn't even gave stamp on warranty card as he said only invoice is enough you won't need warranty card for warranty claims! Why I wasted my time I don't understand! Anyways I'll recommend flipkart to skip installation and Demo and give customer straight away discount instead. Customers know how to fix 4 screws no need to wait for installer for that silly matter!
What more can we expect from a 15k tv! Mi is making our life simple and affordable.
